user_mailer:reset_confirmation:html:body:
We have received a request to reset your password for this email address.
To reset the password, please click here.

If you have not requested a password change, please ignore this email.
user_mailer:reset_confirmation:subject: Password change
user_mailer:reset_confirmation:text:body: If you have requested to reset your password follow the link below. Otherwise please ignore this message. (Your password will not be changed if you don't follow the link below.)
grape:errors:messages:all_or_none: provide all or none of parameters
grape:errors:messages:at_least_one: are missing, at least one parameter must be provided
grape:errors:messages:empty_message_body: empty message body supplied with %{body_format} content-type
grape:errors:messages:exactly_one: are missing, exactly one parameter must be provided
grape:errors:messages:invalid_message_bo: message body does not match declared format
when specifying %{body_format} as content-type, you must pass valid %{body_format} in the request's 'body'
grape:errors:messages:invalid_with_optio: you must specify an entity class in the :with option
grape:errors:messages:missing_mime_type:: you can choose existing mime type from Grape::ContentTypes::CONTENT_TYPES or add your own with content_type :%{new_format}, 'application/%{new_format}'
grape:errors:messages:missing_vendor_opt: when version using header, you must specify :vendor option
grape:errors:messages:too_many_multipart: the number of uploaded files exceeded the system's configured limit (%{limit})
grape:errors:messages:unsupported_group_: group type must be Array, Hash, JSON or Array[JSON]
